episode.title: Episode 1: The Recess Battle
episode.description: Lee & Tee learn how to plan a respectful challenge.

helpers.lee: Think about what the goal is before you act. Planning helps you win with kindness.
helpers.tee: Remember to listen to your teammates and share your ideas clearly.

objectives.language1: Explain a strategy using sequence words.
objectives.content1: Identify the steps of a fair competition.
objectives.content2: Reflect on what makes a respectful challenge.

vocab.title: Vocabulary Power
vocab.intro: Tap a word to explore its meaning, translation, and example.

story.title: Story Time
story.text: Lee and Tee practiced in the courtyard. They wanted to win the recess battle by working together and making a plan.
story.simplified: Lee and Tee practiced together. They made a plan to win by working as a team.
story.hint: Hint: Look for the steps they take to prepare.

practice.title: Practice: Match the Steps
practice.prompt: Drag each action to the right step. You can also switch to Click-to-Place mode.
practice.answer1: Gather your team and list what you need.
practice.answer2: Try the plan and adjust based on feedback.
practice.answer3: Talk about what went well and what to improve.
practice.incorrect: Try again. Match each action to the best step.

check.title: Check Your Understanding
check.option1: Keep the plan secret from your team.
check.option2: Ask your teammate for ideas before starting.
check.incorrect: Not quite. Look for the option about working together.

reflect.title: Reflect & Write
reflect.prompt: How would you prepare for a friendly challenge?

challenge.definition: A task that tests your skills.
challenge.example: Their biggest challenge was working together.

strategy.definition: A plan to reach a goal.
strategy.example: They made a strategy before the game.
